name: Warranty & Claims Assistant
tagline: Streamlines warranty claim processing with intelligent review and routing
overview: The Warranty & Claims Assistant accelerates warranty claim processing by automatically categorizing claims, checking against policy, identifying documentation gaps, and routing to appropriate reviewers. It reduces processing time while maintaining compliance with warranty policies.
whatItDoes: Categorizes warranty claims by type and complexity
Validates claims against warranty policy and coverage
Identifies missing documentation and requests completion
Routes claims to appropriate reviewers based on type and value
Flags potential fraud patterns for investigation
prompts: Is this repair covered under the standard warranty?
What documentation is missing from this claim?
Flag similar claims for this failure mode
What's the average approval time for this claim type?
Route this claim to the appropriate reviewer

impact.description: Faster claim processing with better routing
Fewer claims returned for missing information
